page.title: 16FERRING cont.
page.content: Population of Ferring at present is about 4 and a half thousand. A conservation area exists around the old village heart and church. Modernisation of the church is being opposed by the church goers. The village police office, manned in 16 hour shifts by two policemen,deals with local incidents. Much local protest is being voiced at the proposal to develop a hypermarket on the A259 road which will extend on to the Rife "white land". Ferring football club is beginnning to develop its premises after success in the Sussex County League. Ferring villagers say "Yes" to a railway halt but have consistenly said "No" to street lighting. It is because Ferring is very much on its own in the area , maininting its own identity we decided to do this
